idea-plugin.name: Export Source to Clipboard
idea-plugin.description:
Supercharge your AI-driven development! This plugin automates packaging source code and its full context into your clipboard, streamlining the process of building high-quality prompts for Large Language Models (LLMs). Including file paths, dependencies, and related files gives immediate context to the AI, dramatically improving the accuracy and relevance of its responses. This is essential for complex analysis, refactoring, and code generation tasks.
